text:
e="preserve">Vojtěch Lindaur (12 September 1957 – 8 January 2018) was a Czech journalist, teacher and record producer. He was born in Plzeň, Czech Republic. He studied in Mělník. In 1981, he graduated from Charles University in Prague. In 1987, he produced "Doba ledová" by Precedens, their debut album. Since 1990, he was working for "Rock & Pop" magazine. He also had his own radio show ("Beatová klenotnice") on Radio Beat.
Lindaur died on 8 January 2018 at age of 60.
